name: GLITCHSCAPE (Alex Savander)
description:
Game for GGJ/FGJ 2020.

3D top-down shooter where you main objective is to protect and also fix your spaceship that has broken down. 

The world is full of aggressive mutated creatures that attack your ship and you. You gain money by defeating them allowing you to buy new weapons. 

The game has 5 waves of enemies and 4 enemy types including one final boss.

Credits:

Alex Savander - Programming, Music, 3D

Eeva Torkkola - AI Programming, 3D, Animation, 2D
